name: Smarterdeals.com
overview:
SmarterDeals.com is a popular website that proffers price comparison and best deals to its users. The site offers comparative shopping in Computer Hardware, Software, Portable Electronics, Digital Camera, Camcorder, Camcorder Accessories, Computer Cables and Accessories, Computer Games, Xbox 360, DVD Player, Cellphone Accessories, GPS, GPS Accessories, Video Recorder, Notebook Accessories, Flash Memory & Card Readers, Motherboard and Accessories, PDA Accessories and among other things.

The homepage of the site features â€œDaily Dealsâ€ and “Stock Clearance” which display some of the most trendy products. The homepage also features the shopping categories: Car Stereo, Home Stereo, Phones - Cellular, Phones - Cellular Accessories, Phones - Home/Business, Portable Audio, Printer Accessories, Camcorder Accessories, Camcorders, Camera Accessories, Digital Cameras, Film Cameras, Barcode Scanners, Digitizers/Tablets, Game Controllers, Keyboards, Mice, Scanners, WebCams, Flash Memory & Readers, Notebook Memory, Printer Memory, System Memory, MP3 Accessories, MP3, MP4 Players, Music Hardware, Modems, Network Attached Storage, Network Devices, Notebook Accessories, Notebook Battery, Notebook Drives, Notebook Memory, Notebook Networking, Apple Notebooks, Notebooks without Operating System, Notebooks - Windows.

Three key features of the site are - No Registration is required for visitors to compare the products and their prices; Users can refine their searches with respect to Manufacturers, Brands and Merchants and finally, users can post seller reviews without any glitch.

On the other hand, registered merchants who own stores can receive backlinks toward their storesâ€™ product pages and advertise their stores on SmarterDeals.com. The website brings unbiased Price Comparison on Hi-Tech Products. The website is an important place for anyone who is looking to save money in this recession era while shopping online.
